verses.roman:
tāṅhā lañā rūpa-gosāñi prayāge āilā
mahāprabhu tāhāṅ śuni' ānandita hailā

synonyms: tāṅhā lañā—taking him along; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī; pra yāge—to Prayāga; āilā—came; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāhāṅ—there; śuni'-hearing; ānandita hailā—were very much pleased.
translation: Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī and Anupama Mallika went to Prayāga, and they were very pleased to hear news that Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was there.
